
ameba_add_subdirectories_if(CONFIG_MEDIA_CODEC_HAAC haac)
ameba_add_subdirectories_if(CONFIG_MEDIA_CODEC_AAC fdk-aac)
ameba_add_subdirectories_if(CONFIG_MEDIA_DEMUX_FLAC flac)
ameba_add_subdirectories_if(CONFIG_MEDIA_CODEC_VORBIS tremolo)
if(CONFIG_MEDIA_CODEC_OPUS OR CONFIG_OPUS_LIB)
    ameba_add_subdirectories(opus)
endif()
ameba_add_subdirectories_if(CONFIG_MEDIA_CODEC_GSM gsm)
ameba_add_subdirectories_if(CONFIG_SPEEX_LIB speexdsp)
